statements: SELECT * FROM asset_depreciation;
SELECT id, asset_name, purchase_date, current_value FROM asset_depreciation;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE depreciation_rate > 0.08;
SELECT id, asset_name, purchase_value FROM asset_depreciation ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, current_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE purchase_value > 5000;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE depreciation_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, current_value ASC
SELECT * FROM asset_depreciation WHERE purchase_value BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY asset_name ASC
SELECT id, asset_name, purchase_date, purchase_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE current_value < 500 ORDER BY current_value ASC
SELECT * FROM asset_depreciation WHERE depreciation_rate < 0.05 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, asset_name, current_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE purchase_date > '2020-01-01' AND current_value > 5000 ORDER BY current_value DESC, asset_name DESC
SELECT * FROM asset_depreciation WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT asset_name, purchase_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE purchase_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT id, asset_name, depreciation_rate FROM asset_depreciation ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM value_changes WHERE new_value > 5000;
SELECT id, change_date, new_value FROM value_changes WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM asset_depreciation ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE depreciation_rate > 0.1;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_value, depreciation_rate, purchase_date FROM asset_depreciation WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT asset_name, purchase_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE depreciation_rate BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.1;
SELECT asset_name, depreciation_rate, change_date, new_value FROM asset_depreciation JOIN value_changes ON asset_depreciation.id = value_changes.asset_id ORDER BY change_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM asset_depreciation WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE purchase_value > 5000;
SELECT asset_id, purchase_date FROM asset_depreciation ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_type = 'Expense';
SELECT asset_name, depreciation_rate FROM asset_depreciation WHERE depreciation_rate < 5.00;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, purchase_date, purchase_value FROM asset_depreciation ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, purchase_value, depreciation_rate FROM asset_depreciation WHERE depreciation_rate > 5 ORDER BY purchase_value ASC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, current_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE current_value < purchase_value * 0.8;
SELECT asset_id, change_date, previous_value, new_value FROM value_changes ORDER BY change_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_id, transaction_date, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_value FROM asset_depreciation;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date, depreciation_rate FROM asset_depreciation ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, depreciation_amount, depreciation_date FROM depreciation_records WHERE depreciation_amount > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, revenue, expenses, profit_loss FROM financial_data WHERE profit_loss < 0;
SELECT asset_name, new_value, change_date FROM value_change ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM asset_depreciation ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE depreciation_rate > 0.1;
SELECT asset_id, SUM(depreciation_amount) AS total_depreciation FROM depreciation_records GROUP BY asset_id ORDER BY total_depreciation DESC;
SELECT asset_name, revenue, expenses, profit_loss FROM financial_data WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-03-31';

SELECT asset_id, asset_name, purchase_date, depreciation_rate FROM asset_depreciation JOIN value_change ON asset_depreciation.asset_id = value_change.asset_id WHERE new_value > purchase_value ORDER BY new_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM asset_depreciation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date, current_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE initial_value > 5000;
SELECT asset_name, depreciation_amount FROM asset_depreciation JOIN depreciation_schedule ON asset_depreciation.id = depreciation_schedule.asset_id;
SELECT id, purchase_date, initial_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE current_value < 8000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT id, asset_name, purchase_date FROM asset_depreciation WHERE depreciation_rate >= 10 ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date, current_value FROM asset_depreciation WHERE current_value < 5000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT asset_name, depreciation_amount FROM asset_depreciation JOIN depreciation_schedule ON asset_depreciation.id = depreciation_schedule.asset_id WHERE depreciation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY depreciation_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_name, initial_value, depreciation_rate FROM asset_depreciation WHERE initial_value BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY initial_value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_name, new_value FROM asset_depreciation JOIN value_changes ON asset_depreciation.id = value_changes.asset_id WHERE new_value < current_value ORDER BY new_value ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT category_name, description FROM asset_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC LIMIT 5;
